Text:
Thanks, nice find.

The original from the HubbelSite is 'only' 109.99MB :)

http://hubblesite.org/newscenter/archive/releases/2004/2004/07/image/a/warn/

Lot's of other beautiful pictures there to, and the nasa site = fast 
http://hubblesite.org/newscenter/archive/releases/

The biggest i've downloaded so far is "Grand Design Spiral Galaxy M81.tiff"

689.53MB  22620*15200*24

And it eats most viewers, lol.
ps. i don't know how it works but you can find raw HUDF files here: http://www.stsci.edu/hst/udf
